course_description: This course guides students in developing the ability to conduct high-quality research in Artificial Intelligence (AI). Throughout the course, students will work on team projects, write research papers (both individually and in groups), peer-review papers from others, and give public presentations.
prerequisites: CS 325 or CS 334 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
